plugins.name: learning-log
plugins.description: Automatically record learning notes and insights to a timestamped log file with AI-generated supplements and web search references. Create structured summaries through interactive dialogue.

plugins.name: dev-workflow
plugins.description: 開発ワークフロー管理プラグイン。設計→実装→検証の統合ワークフロー、コーディング規約管理、スキル・プラグイン作成支援を提供。8つのスキル：implementation-workflow, design-discussion, implementation, behavior-verification, coding-standards, coding-standards-creator, skill-updater, plugin-creator
